text: Ivan Radeljić (born 14 September 1980) is a Bosnian retired football player who played as a defender. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Season Club League Apps Goals Croatia Croatia Croatia League League 1999–00 Hajduk Split Prva HNL 8 0 1999–00 Zadar Druga HNL 0 0 2000–01 Hajduk Split Prva HNL 5 0 2001–02 Šibenik 23 1 2002–03 Hajduk Split 13 0 2003–04 Inter Zaprešić 16 0 Japan Japan Japan League League 2004 Cerezo Osaka J1 League 15 0 Croatia Croatia Croatia League League 2004–05 Inter Zaprešić Prva HNL 14 0 2005–06 18 0 2005–06 Slaven Belupo 14 0 2006–07 31 1 2007–08 17 1 Germany Germany Germany League League 2007–08 Energie Cottbus Bundesliga 16 0 2008–09 25 0 Turkey Turkey Turkey League League 2009–10 Gençlerbirliği Süper Lig Country Croatia Croatia 159 3 Country Japan Japan 15 0 Country Germany Germany 41 0 Country Turkey Turkey 0 0 Total Total Total 215 3 == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Cerezo Osaka players Category:J1 League players Category:Bundesliga players Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers
